title: Company officials sentenced on migrant exploitation charges (Immigration New Zealand)
text: ( Source : Immigration New Zealand ) Two people involved in the management of the Auckland Indian restaurant chain Masala have been sentenced at the Auckland District Court this morning on charges related to the exploitation of migrant
